prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted geometric crystalline head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, sacred mountain patterns, styled with Throne marshals influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by emerald and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with Hexagonal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor OXLOPAR's profile: 'He who has them in his hands', Aethyr BAG, Earth element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'As OXLOPAR approaches, a protective hold grips the environment like an invisible hand preventing any straying, it is both sheltering and unyieldingly firm.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted geometric crystalline head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Hexagonal
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fractal, sacred mountain patterns, styled with Throne marshals influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who has them in his hands'
profile_data.essence: As OXLOPAR approaches, a protective hold grips the environment like an invisible hand preventing any straying, it is both sheltering and unyieldingly firm.
profile_data.angelic_role: Throne of Providential Grasp; marshals mountain wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted geometric form resembling an obsidian mountain shard, representing Earth's elemental strength and the mountain wardens' unyielding nature. The crystalline structure suggests both transformation (Death card correspondence) and structural integrity.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Black represents Geburah's power and severity, emerald green symbolizes Earth's generative power, slate gray reflects mountain stone and disciplined protection
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal patterns mirror Earth's crystal structures, fractal nature represents infinite protective complexity
